columns.name: workgroup_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the workgroup.

columns.name: workgroup_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that links to the workgroup.

columns.name: base_capacity
columns.description: The base data warehouse capacity of the workgroup in Redshift Processing Units (RPUs).

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of the workgroup.

columns.name: enhanced_vpc_routing
columns.description: The value that specifies whether to enable enhanced virtual private cloud (VPC) routing, which forces Amazon Redshift Serverless to route traffic through your VPC.

columns.name: namespace_name
columns.description: The namespace the workgroup is associated with.

columns.name: publicly_accessible
columns.description: A value that specifies whether the workgroup can be accessible from a public network.

columns.name: config_parameters
columns.description: An array of parameters to set for finer control over a database.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The endpoint that is created from the workgroup.

columns.name: security_group_ids
columns.description: An array of security group IDs to associate with the workgroup.

columns.name: subnet_ids
columns.description: An array of subnet IDs the workgroup is associated with.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the workgroup.
